title: In The Midst Of A Violent Morning, Parisians Seek To Cope
teaser: Sylvie Kauffmann, editorial director of the French newspaper Le Monde, speaks to Renee Montagne about the impact of the events unfolding in Paris and its nearby suburbs on the French people.
contentencoded: Copyright 2015 NPR. To see more, visit http://www.npr.org/.
